main event: On September 6, 1955, multiple flight crews on Colonial Airlines observed an unidentified object in the sky emitting a blue-white exhaust flame and resulting in a blinding flash.
interesting points: The object was initially observed by a flight crew at approximately 6000 ft., The crew described the object having a blue-white exhaust flame followed by an explosion, Two other flights in the area also reported seeing the same flash, The total observation time of the object was around 3 to 5 seconds, Investigators suggested the sighting may have been caused by a celestial phenomenon or fireball.
sighted object: unidentified object with blue-white exhaust flame
witness description: pilot and copilot of Colonial Airlines flights, ground witnesses including a housewife and her family
